text: Kandi inyanja ebyiri ntizishobora kumera kimwe: imwe ifite amazi y’urubogobogo amara inyota, n’indi y’urwunyunyu rukaze. No muri (izo nyanja) zombi mubonamo inyama murya z’umwimerere (amafi), mukanakuramo imitako mwambara. Kandi ubona amato muri zo agenda azibeyura kugira ngo mushakishe ingabire ze, ndetse no kugira ngo mubashe gushimira
